parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Preloads all textures, materials and proxies needed to render given object. Works with both class names and objects. Returns true once all data is loaded and ready.<br><br>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Important </title><part><name index="1"/><value> At least one object of the given classname has to be present in the current mission in order for alternative syntax version of the command to have any effect</value></part></template></value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> distance '''preloadObject''' object </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> distance: [[Number]] -  distance at which preload the object </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p2 </name>=<value> object: [[Object]] - existing object </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] - [[true]] when preload is finished </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>s2 </name>=<value> distance '''preloadObject''' classname </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> distance: [[Number]]  -  distance at which preload the object </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER21</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p22 </name>=<value> classname: [[String]] - classname of the object </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER22</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name> r2 </name>=<value> [[Boolean]] - [[true]] when preload is finished </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[] [[spawn]] 
{
	[[waitUntil]] {10 [[preloadObject]] "SoldierW"};
	[[hint]] "Preload finished";
};</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[] [[spawn]] 
{
	[[waitUntil]] {10 [[preloadObject]] [[leader]] [[player]]};
	[[hint]] "Preload finished";
};</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value>   [[preloadCamera]], [[preloadSound]], [[preloadTitleObj]], [[preloadTitleRsc]]</value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
